column3: I think a better tooltip would be "Native segwit addresses (Bech32) reduce your transaction fees later on and offer better protection against typos, but are unsupported by old wallets. When unchecked, an address compatible with older wallets will be created instead."\n\nBut otherwise utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13251/commits/82dda6bed971c5638962442b4927845fe5eb6600
Thanks. Sorry I've fallen so far behind on rebases. :(
